column4: ok; who here actually HAS 3d accel working with an ATI card ?
i'm missing something
well, I can't figure out the "useinternalAGPGART" part
noone here has it working that can help ?
nobody can help me with ati troubles ?
#ati is dead
whats up?
do you have 3d accel working with an ATI card ?
yes
may I ask you a few questions ?
shoot
where do I add the option to use external AGPGART  ?
where did you get that driver!
ok; i install with dpkg -i, and then what, run through fglrxconfig as normal ?
no: let me search the forums
I need gcc for this I assume ?
did you have that ?
Yes
what must I do to get around it ?
how did you get around it ?
around what?
start with `sudo apt-get remove fglrx*`
READ Note: before you start check if you have installed the linux-headers for your kernel and gcc (Synaptic)
did you do anything other than follow that guide ?
